Text: Thank you so much for putting this up!!! Its is IMPOSSIBLE to buy it in europe, could not find anywhere!!! And it is a shame, cus it's one of Steve's best movies (Natalie's too!).

Wow! I really enjoyed this movie. Been searching for it for a long time (Netherlands). Do you have golden oldies "The Honeymoon machine" and "Never love a stranger" both starring Steve McQueen by any chance?
Thanks a ton John! Really appreciate your work!
